title: GameGuard Conflict
body:
League and Gameguard are not able to co-exist after the latest patch 6.20 or after the latest patch of gameguard. One of the two things. Both league and gameguard got updated very recently on the same day, ever since then if a game with gameguard is open and you try to open league, The gameguard which I hate with passion and the shittiest hacking protection system, closes the league client. 

This started happening ever since the latest patch. 

Help please !!

replies.body: Yes there is another game open that uses gameguard. But apparently since the first day itself, it has never caused this problem. How come gameguard is treating league as cheating program, all of a sudden since the last patch

Do you have another program open at the same time that's using gameguard?  If you have another game open and launch league, it's possible that it's treating league as if it's some form of cheat.  Let me know if that helps!
